verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ يَتَس<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: О чем они друг друга вопрошают

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14239'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َبَإِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14240'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
كَلَّا سَيَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ

ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ

أَلَمْ نَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14221'>جْ</tajweed>عَلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14222'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضَ مِهَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دًا
verses.translation: Но разве Мы не разостлали землю вам Широкой колыбелью

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا

وَخَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14241'>قْ</tajweed>نَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كُمْ أَزْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>جًا
وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
وَجَعَلْنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7689'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا

وَجَعَلْنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14242'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهَارَ مَعَاشًا

وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7306'>بْ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14243'>عًا ش</tajweed>ِدَادًا
وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14244'>جًا و</tajweed>َهَّاجًا
verses.translation: И поместили в них пылающий светильник

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':271'>نز</tajweed>َلْنَا مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14245'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُعْصِر<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14246'>ءً ث</tajweed>َجَّاجًا
verses.translation: И шлем из облаков обильные дожди

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> حَب<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14247'>ًّا و</tajweed>َنَبَاتًا

وَجَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تٍ أَلْفَافًا

إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ يَوْمَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12368'>ٱ</tajweed>لْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تًا

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَ يُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4184'>نف</tajweed>َخُ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4185'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yauma yunfakhu fiṣ-ṣūri fa ta'tūna afwājā(n).
verses.translation: Тот День, Когда раздастся трубный глас И толпами пойдете вы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَفُتِحَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14248'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ فَكَانَتْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':12251'>بْ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>بًا
وَسُيِّرَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14249'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا

إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ جَهَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
لِّلطَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>غِينَ مَـَٔـابًا

لَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِثِينَ فِيه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَحْقَابًا

verses.text_uthmani: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14250'>دًا و</tajweed>َلَا شَرَابًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lā yażūqūna fīhā bardaw wa lā syarābā(n).
verses.translation: И не вкушать им там ни влаги, ни прохлады, "Падите ниц в молитве (перед Богом)!", Они не внемлют

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا حَمِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14251'>مًا و</tajweed>َغَسَّاقًا
verses.translation: Помимо пития из жидкости кипящей И темного питья из нечистот

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: جَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14252'>ءً و</tajweed>ِفَاقًا

إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ كَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
verses.translation: Ведь на расплату (за свои грехи) Они надежд не возлагали

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكَذَّبُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِـَٔـايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِنَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: И, сея ложь, отвергли все знаменья Наши

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ كِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بًا
verses.translation: Мы ж все сочли и записали

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَذُوقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فَل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14253'>َن ن</tajweed>َّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.translation: Вкусите же (награду за свои грехи) - И никакого усиления удач и благ Мы (в жизни этой) вам не предоставим, Помимо возрастания (в Аду) всех наказаний

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.translation: Поистине, для почитателей Аллаха В Раю - пристанище благое

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: حَد<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِقَ وَأَعْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بًا
وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
وَكَأْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14254'>سًا د</tajweed>ِهَاقًا

verses.text_uthmani: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13226'>وًا و</tajweed>َلَا كِذّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>بًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lā yasma'ūna fīhā lagwaw wa lā kiżżābā(n).
verses.translation: Они не встретят там Ни пустословия, ни лжи

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: جَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14255'>ءً م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':770'>ِن ر</tajweed>َّبِّكَ عَط<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءً حِسَابًا
verses.translation: Как воздаянье Господа и дар Его (сполна)

verses.text_uthmani: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: رَّبِّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12320'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':177'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14256'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّحْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نِ‌ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Rabbis-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā bainahumar-raḥmāni lā yamlikūna minhu khiṭābā(n).
verses.translation: От Господа земли и неба И того, что между ними суще, - От Милосердного! С Которым Речь держать они не смеют

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14257'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رُّوحُ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1146'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَةُ صَف<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14258'>ًّا‌ۖ ل</tajweed>َّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':8399'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّحْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yauma yaqūmur-rūḥu wal-malā'ikatu ṣaffā(n), lā yatakallamūna illā man ażina lahur-raḥmānu wa qāla ṣawābā(n).
verses.translation: В тот День Рядами встанут ангелы и Дух Святой, И речь глаголать будут те, Кому дозволит Милосердный. И будут праведны их речи

verses.text_uthmani: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13944'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَوْمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14259'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَقُّ‌ۖ فَمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':8041'>ن ش</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14056'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> مَـَٔـابًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Żālikal-yaumul-ḥaqq(u), faman syā'attakhaża ilā rabbihī ma'ābā(n).
verses.translation: День этот - Истина (Господнего Завета), И тот, кто этого желает, Пойдет путем возврата к Богу своему

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَـٰكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā anżarnākum 'ażāban qarībā(n), yauma yanẓurul-mar'u mā qaddamat yadāhu wa yaqūlul-kāfiru yā laitanī kuntu turābā(n).
verses.translation: Поистине, предупрежденье было вам О наказанье близком (в Судный День), - В тот День, Когда вы сможете узреть Деянья те, что ваши руки совершили. А тот, кто верой пренебрег, воскликнет: "О, горе мне! Уж лучше быть мне прахом
